hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said:A man came to the Prophet (ﷺ). He broke his fast during Ramadan. He then narrated the rest of this tradition adding: Then a huge basket containing fifteen sa's of dates was brought to him. He said: Eat it yourself and your family and keep one fast and beg pardon of Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب كَفَّارَةِ مَنْ أَتَى أَهْلَهُ فِي رَمَضَانَ
chapter.eng-name: Expiation For A Man Who Has Sexual Intercourse With His Wife During Ramadan
